description.oldValue:
IT admins can now disable chat write access at the policy level for non-federated users and unauthenticated users who join Teams meetings through a link that must be used in conjunction with disabled meeting chat policy to provide additional security against data exfiltration.
GA date: June CY2022
description.newValue:
IT admins can now
disable chat write access at the policy level for non-federated users and
unauthenticated users who join Teams meetings through a link that must be used
in conjunction with disabled meeting chat policy to provide additional security
against data exfiltration.
